name: Look At The Danger
description:
A simple horror game with ps1 graphics syle. Made With Godot! 

Alerts:

I didn't make those pretty models and textures, except the flashlight! they were made by Miziziziz, Garbaj, BitHack and Namahoi.

I don't have any previous experience with Godot and made the project in 2 days! Hope you understand!

I plan to continue developing the game and will update it every week.

Version: Alpha 0.0.1
